00273 template < class T >
00274 inline bool operator == ( const Array< T >& v, const Array< T >& w )
00275 {
00276 
00277                 if ( !v.samedim( w ) ) return false;
00278                 typename Array<T>::iterator iterV, iterW;
00279                 for(iterV = v.begin(), iterW = w.begin(); iterV != v.end();
00280                           iterV++, iterW++)
00281                 {
00282                         if (*iterV != *iterW) return false;
00283                 }
00284                 return true;
00285 }

00387 template < class T >
00388 inline bool operator < ( const Array< T >& v, const Array< T >& w )
00389 {
00390     if( v.nelem( ) == w.nelem( ) ) {
00391 
00392         for( unsigned i = 0; i < v.nelem( ); ++i )
00393             if( w.elem( i ) < v.elem( i ) )
00394                 return false;
00395 
00396         else if( v.elem( i ) < w.elem( i ) )
00397             return true;
00398 
00399     }
00400 
00401     return v.nelem( ) < w.nelem( );
00402 }

00551 template < class T > 
00552 inline Array< T > innerProduct( const Array< T >& v, const Array< T >& w )
00553 {
00554     unsigned vd = v.ndim( );
00555     unsigned wd = w.ndim( );
00556     unsigned zd = vd + wd - 2;
00557     unsigned i, j, k;
00558     T        t;
00559     Array< T > z;
00560 
00561     //
00562     // handle scalar values
00563     //
00564     if( vd == 0 || wd == 0 )
00565         {
00566         if( vd == 0 && v.nelem( ) == 1 )
00567                 {
00568                         return w * v.elem( 0 );
00569                 }
00570         else if( wd == 0 && w.nelem( ) == 1 )
00571                 {
00572                         return w.elem( 0 ) * v;
00573                 }
00574                 else
00575                 {
00576                         return Array< T >( );
00577                 }
00578     }
00579     // two vectors (the "original" inner product): 
00580     else if ( vd == 1 && wd == 1 )
00581     {
00582         t = scalarProduct( v, w );
00583         z.resize( 1 );
00584         z( 0 ) = t;  
00585         return Array< T >( z, true );
00586     } 
00587 
00588     SIZE_CHECK( v.dim( vd-1 ) == w.dim( 0 ) )
00589 
00590     std::vector< unsigned > dim( zd );
00591 
00592     for( i = j = 0; j < vd-1; dim[ i++ ] = v.dim( j++ ) );
00593     for(     j = 1; j < wd  ; dim[ i++ ] = w.dim( j++ ) );
00594 
00595     z.resize( dim );
00596 
00597     std::vector< unsigned > vdim( vd );
00598     std::vector< unsigned > wdim( wd );
00599 
00600     std::vector< unsigned > zdim( zd, 0U );
00601 
00602     do
00603         {
00604         for( i = j = 0; j < vd-1; vdim[ j++ ] = zdim[ i++ ] );
00605         for(     j = 1; j < wd  ; wdim[ j++ ] = zdim[ i++ ] );
00606                 for( t = T( 0 ), k = 0; k < w.dim( 0 ); k++ )
00607                 {
00608                         vdim[ vd-1 ] = wdim[ 0 ] = k;
00609                         t += v( vdim ) * w( wdim );
00610                 }
00611                 z( zdim ) = t;
00612 
00613                 for( i = 0; i < zd && ++zdim[ i ] >= z.dim( i ); zdim[ i++ ] = 0 );
00614     }
00615         while( i < zd );
00616 
00617     return Array< T >( z, true );
00618 }

00621 //===================================================================
00660 template < class T > 
00661 inline Array< T > outerProduct( const Array< T >& v, const Array< T >& w )
00662 {
00663     unsigned vd = v.ndim( );
00664     unsigned wd = w.ndim( );
00665     unsigned zd;
00666 
00667     //
00668     // handle scalar values
00669     //
00670     if( vd == 0 || wd == 0 )
00671         {
00672         if( vd == 0 && v.nelem( ) == 1 )
00673                 {
00674                         return w * v.elem( 0 );
00675                 }
00676         else if( wd == 0 && w.nelem( ) == 1 )
00677                 {
00678                         return w.elem( 0 ) * v;
00679                 }
00680                 else
00681                 {
00682                         return Array< T >( );
00683                 }
00684     }
00685 
00686     unsigned i, j;
00687 
00688     std::vector< unsigned > dim( zd = vd + wd );
00689 
00690     for( i = j = 0; j < vd; dim[ i++ ] = v.dim( j++ ) );
00691     for(     j = 0; j < wd; dim[ i++ ] = w.dim( j++ ) );
00692 
00693     Array< T > z;
00694     z.resize( dim );
00695 
00696     std::vector< unsigned > vdim( vd );
00697     std::vector< unsigned > wdim( wd );
00698     std::vector< unsigned > zdim( zd, 0U );
00699 
00700     do
00701     {
00702         for( i = j = 0; j < vd; vdim[ j++ ] = zdim[ i++ ] );
00703  
00704         for(     j = 0; j < wd; wdim[ j++ ] = zdim[ i++ ] );
00705 
00706         z( zdim ) = v( vdim ) * w( wdim );
00707 
00708         for( i = 0; i < zd && ++zdim[ i ] >= z.dim( i ); zdim[ i++ ] = 0 );
00709     }
00710     while( i < zd );
00711 
00712     return Array< T >( z, true );
00713 }

00755 template < class T > 
00756 inline T scalarProduct( const Array< T >& v, const Array< T >& w )
00757 {
00758     SIZE_CHECK( v.samedim( w ) )
00759 
00760     T t( 0 );
00761     for( unsigned i = v.nelem( ); i--; t += v.elem( i ) * w.elem( i ) );
00762     return t;
00763 }

00799 template < class T > 
00800 inline T sqrDistance( const Array< T >& v, const Array< T >& w )
00801 {
00802     SIZE_CHECK( v.samedim( w ) )
00803 
00804     T d, t( 0 );
00805     for( unsigned i = v.nelem( ); i--; )
00806         {
00807         d  = v.elem( i ) - w.elem( i );
00808                 t += d * d;
00809     }
00810 
00811     return t;
00812 }

00848 template < class T > 
00849 inline T euclidianDistance( const Array< T >& v, const Array< T >& w )
00850 {
00851     return sqrt( sqrDistance( v, w ) );
00852 }

00884 inline T sum( const Array< T >& v )
00885 {
00886     T t( 0 );

00888     return t;

00995 {

01023 template < class T >
01024 inline T min( const Array< T >& v )
01025 {
01026     RANGE_CHECK( v.nelem( ) > 0 )
01027 
01028     T t( v.elem( 0 ) );
01029 
01030     for( unsigned i = 1; i < v.nelem( ); ++i )
01031         if( v.elem( i ) < t ) t = v.elem( i );
01032 
01033     return t;
01034 }

01082 template < class T >
01083 inline T min( const Array< T >& v, unsigned & ind,
01084               unsigned start = 0, unsigned end = 0)
01085 {
01086     RANGE_CHECK( v.nelem( ) > 0 )
01087     RANGE_CHECK( v.nelem( ) > start)
01088     RANGE_CHECK( v.nelem( ) >= end)
01089 
01090     RANGE_CHECK( end        >= start)
01091                 
01092     T t( v.elem( start ) );
01093                 ind = start;
01094                 if (end == 0)
01095                 {
01096                         end = v.nelem( );
01097                 }
01098     for( unsigned i = start; i < end; ++i )
01099         if( v.elem( i ) < t )
01100         {
01101                                         t   = v.elem( i );
01102                                         ind = long(i);
01103                                 }
01104 
01105     return t;
01106 }

01237 template < class T >
01238 inline void minmax( const Array< T >& v, T& minVal, T& maxVal )
01239 {
01240     if( v.nelem( ) > 0 ) {
01241         minVal = maxVal = v.elem( 0 );
01242 
01243         for( unsigned i = 1; i < v.nelem( ); ++i ) {
01244             if( v.elem( i ) < minVal )
01245                 minVal = v.elem( i );
01246             else if( v.elem( i ) > maxVal )
01247                 maxVal = v.elem( i );
01248         }
01249     }
01250 }

01253 //===================================================================
01328 template < class T >
01329 bool prettyprint( std::ostream& os, const Array< T >& v, unsigned depth = 0 )
01330 {
01331     unsigned i, j;
01332     bool     nl;
01333 
01334     if( v.ndim( ) == 0 ) {
01335         os << v.elem( 0 ) << " ";
01336         return false;
01337     } else if( v.ndim( ) == 1 ) {
01338         os << "( ";
01339         for( i  = 0; i < v.dim( 0 ); i++ )
01340             prettyprint( os, v[ i ], depth + 1 );
01341         os << ") ";
01342         return true;
01343     } else {
01344         os << "( ";
01345         i = 0;
01346         nl = prettyprint( os, v[ i++ ], depth + 1 );
01347         while( i < v.dim( 0 ) ) {
01348             if( nl ) {
01349                 os << "\n  ";
01350                 for( j = 0; j < depth; j++ ) os << "  ";
01351             }
01352             nl = prettyprint( os, v[ i++ ], depth + 1 );
01353         }
01354         os << ") ";
01355         return nl;
01356     }
01357 }

01362 //===================================================================
01401 template < class T >
01402 inline std::istream& operator >> ( std::istream& is, Array< T >& a )
01403 {
01404     const unsigned MaxLen = 1024;
01405     char           s[ MaxLen ];
01406     char*          p;
01407     unsigned       i;
01408     std::vector< unsigned > idx;
01409 
01410     is >> std::ws;
01411     is.getline( s, MaxLen );
01412 
01413     p = strchr( s, '>' );
01414     if( p && *p ) p++;
01415     if( p && *p ) p++;
01416 
01417     TYPE_CHECK( p && *p )
01418     if( p && *p ) {
01419         do {
01420             if( *p == ',' ) p++;
01421             idx.push_back( unsigned( strtol( p, &p, 10 ) ) );
01422         } while( p && *p == ',' );
01423 
01424         TYPE_CHECK( p && *p == ')' )
01425 
01426         a.resize( idx );
01427 
01428         for( i = 0; i < a.nelem( ) && is.good( ); i++ )
01429             is >> a.elem( i );
01430     }
01431 
01432     return is >> std::ws;
01433 }

01496 template < class T >
01497 inline std::ostream& operator << ( std::ostream& os, const Array< T >& a )
01498 {
01499     unsigned i;
01500 
01501     os << "Array<" << typeid( T ).name( ) << ">(";
01502     for( i = 0; i < a.ndim( ); ++i ) {
01503         if( i ) os << ',';
01504         os << a.dim( i );
01505     }
01506     os << ")\n";
01507 
01508     for( i = 0; i < a.nelem( ); ++i ) {
01509         if( i ) os << '\t';
01510         os << a.elem( i );
01511     }
01512 
01513     return os << std::endl;
01514 }

01518 //===================================================================
01543 template < class T >
01544 inline void clip
01545 (
01546     Array< T >& valArrA,
01547     const T&    lowerBoundA,
01548     const T&    upperBoundA
01549 )
01550 {
01551     for( unsigned i = valArrA.nelem( ); i--; )
01552     {
01553         if( valArrA.elem( i ) < lowerBoundA )
01554         {
01555             valArrA.elem( i ) = lowerBoundA;
01556         }
01557         else if( valArrA.elem( i ) > upperBoundA )
01558         {
01559             valArrA.elem( i ) = upperBoundA;
01560         }
01561     }
01562 }

01569 template < class T >                                                       \
01570 inline Array< T > operator op ( const Array< T >& v )                      \
01571 {                                                                          \
01572    Array< T > z;                                                           \
01573                                                                            \
01574    z.resize( v );                                                          \
01575    typename Array<T>::iterator iterZ;                                      \
01576    typename Array<T>::iterator iterV;                                      \
01577    for(iterV = v.begin(), iterZ = z.begin(); iterV != v.end();             \
01578                     iterV++, iterZ++)                                      \
01579    {                                                                       \
01580                     *iterZ = op *iterV;                                    \
01581    }                                                                       \
01582                                                                            \
01583    return Array< T >( z, true );                                           \
01584 }

01602 #define BinaryOperator( op )                                               \
01603 template < class T >                                                       \
01604 inline Array< T > operator op ( const Array< T >& v, const Array< T >& w ) \
01605 {                                                                          \
01606    SIZE_CHECK( v.samedim( w ) )                                            \
01607                                                                            \
01608    Array< T > z;                                                           \
01609    z.resize( v );                                                          \
01610                                                                            \
01611    typename Array<T>::iterator iterZ;                                      \
01612    typename Array<T>::iterator iterW;                                      \
01613    typename Array<T>::iterator iterV;                                      \
01614    for(iterV = v.begin(), iterW = w.begin(), iterZ = z.begin();            \
01615                     iterV != v.end(); iterV++, iterW++, iterZ++)           \
01616    {                                                                       \
01617                     *iterZ = *iterV op *iterW;                             \
01618    }                                                                       \
01619                                                                            \
01620    return Array< T >( z, true );                                           \
01621 }                                                                          \
01622                                                                            \
01623 template < class T >                                                       \
01624 inline Array< T > operator op ( const Array< T >& v, T w )                 \
01625 {                                                                          \
01626    Array< T > z;                                                           \
01627    z.resize( v );                                                          \
01628                                                                            \
01629    typename Array<T>::iterator iterZ;                                      \
01630    typename Array<T>::iterator iterV;                                      \
01631    for(iterV = v.begin(), iterZ = z.begin();                               \
01632                     iterV != v.end(); iterV++, iterZ++)                    \
01633    {                                                                       \
01634                     *iterZ = *iterV op w;                                  \
01635    }                                                                       \
01636                                                                            \
01637    return Array< T >( z, true );                                           \
01638 }                                                                          \
01639                                                                            \
01640 template < class T >                                                       \
01641 inline Array< T > operator op ( T v, const Array< T >& w )                 \
01642 {                                                                          \
01643    Array< T > z;                                                           \
01644    z.resize( w );                                                          \
01645                                                                            \
01646    typename Array<T>::iterator iterZ;                                      \
01647    typename Array<T>::iterator iterW;                                      \
01648    for(iterW = w.begin(), iterZ = z.begin();                               \
01649                     iterW != w.end(); iterW++, iterZ++)                    \
01650    {                                                                       \
01651                     *iterZ = v op *iterW;                                  \
01652    }                                                                       \
01653                                                                            \
01654    return Array< T >( z, true );                                           \
01655 }

01700 #define CompoundAssignmentOperator( op )                                   \
01701 template < class T, class S >                                              \
01702 inline Array< T >& operator op ( Array< T >& v, const Array< S >& w )      \
01703 {                                                                          \
01704    SIZE_CHECK( v.samedim( w ) )                                            \
01705                                                                            \
01706    typename Array<S>::iterator iterW;                                      \
01707    typename Array<T>::iterator iterV;                                      \
01708    for(iterV = v.begin(), iterW = w.begin();                               \
01709                     iterV != v.end(); iterV++, iterW++)                    \
01710    {                                                                       \
01711                     *iterV op *iterW;                                      \
01712    }                                                                       \
01713                                                                            \
01714    return v;                                                               \
01715 }                                                                          \
01716                                                                            \

01721    for(iterV = v.begin(); iterV != v.end(); iterV++)                       \
01722    {                                                                       \
01723                     *iterV op w;                                           \
01724    }                                                                       \
01725                                                                            \
01726    return v;                                                               \
01727 }                                                                          \

01784 CompoundAssignmentOperator( /= )
01785 
01786 
01787 // Remainder
01788 CompoundAssignmentOperator( %= )
01789 
01790 #undef CompoundAssignmentOperator
01791 
01792 
01793 #define UnaryFunction( func )                                              \
01794 template < class T >                                                       \
01795 inline Array< T > func ( const Array< T >& v )                             \
01796 {                                                                          \
01797    Array< T > z;                                                           \
01798    z.resize( v );                                                          \
01799                                                                            \
01800    typename Array<T>::iterator iterZ;                                      \
01801    typename Array<T>::iterator iterV;                                      \
01802    for(iterV = v.begin(), iterZ = z.begin(); iterV != v.end();             \
01803                     iterV++, iterZ++)                                      \
01804    {                                                                       \
01805                     *iterZ = func( *iterV );                               \
01806    }                                                                       \
01807                                                                            \
01808    return Array< T >( z, true );                                           \
01809 }

01913 #define BinaryFunction( func )                                             \
01914 template < class T >                                                       \
01915 inline Array< T > func( const Array< T >& v, const Array< T >& w )         \
01916 {                                                                          \
01917    SIZE_CHECK( v.samedim( w ) )                                            \
01918                                                                            \
01919    Array< T > z;                                                           \
01920    z.resize( v );                                                          \
01921                                                                            \
01922    for( unsigned i = z.nelem( ); i--; )                                    \
01923        z.elem( i ) = func( v.elem( i ), w.elem( i ) );                     \
01924                                                                            \
01925    return Array< T >( z, true );                                           \
01926 }                                                                          \
01927                                                                            \
01928 template < class T >                                                       \
01929 inline Array< T > func( const Array< T >& v, T w )                         \
01930 {                                                                          \
01931    Array< T > z;                                                           \
01932    z.resize( v );                                                          \
01933                                                                            \
01934    for( unsigned i = z.nelem( ); i--; )                                    \
01935        z.elem( i ) = func( v.elem( i ), w );                               \
01936                                                                            \
01937    return Array< T >( z, true );                                           \
01938 }                                                                          \
01939                                                                            \
01940 template < class T >                                                       \
01941 inline Array< T > func( T v, const Array< T >& w )                         \
01942 {                                                                          \
01943    Array< T > z;                                                           \
01944    z.resize( w );                                                          \
01945                                                                            \
01946    for( unsigned i = z.nelem( ); i--; )                                    \
01947        z.elem( i ) = func( v, w.elem( i ) );                               \
01948                                                                            \
01949    return Array< T >( z, true );                                           \
01950 }

01956 BinaryFunction( atan2 )

01966 #undef BinaryFunction
